website_summaries.verdict: Highly durable and weatherproof 300 Denier polyester fabric, featuring hidden pockets to store away locks and alarms.
pros: Double-vented cover helps airflow to prevent mildew and condensation
Taped seams add extra security for water protection
Features a durable elastic hem around the bottom and a strap with latch buckle for extra wind protection
cons: Some users in more arid conditions are worried it doesn't have UV protection and will degrade over time

customer_reviews.title: Badass is a Wetass - Not Waterproof as Claimed
customer_reviews.text: I tried this instead of another Dowco Guardian Weatherall since the recent Dowco reviews seem to suggest that the newer Dowcos are lower quality. My original Dowco was a great product. The Badass cover is nice, appears to be a quality product, covers the bike more than the Dowco, but I have to dry my bike after every rain. Not sure why it leaks, since it has taped seams, but it does. Buyer's remorse after buying this cover since the Dowco never leaked and I got nearly 4 years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cover
customer_reviews.text: I own a Harley cover and always had water go thru. I ordered this cover and it has been the best purchase I have made. It fits my 2017 Roadglide perfect and it is water resistant and has vents so no sweating. Ot also has an elastic bottom that allows it to hug the contour of the bike and also a safety harness that clips below the bike to protect the co er from blowing away in high winds. I would tell everyone to buy this before spending 250 to 300 on a Harley OEM cover. I would give this 10 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product!!! Covers a 2003 Indian motorcycle better than any cover we have purchased over the years...its perfect for our needs and covers the motorcycle completely even with the full wind shiield. I did alot of research on the web til I took a chance on this one and so glad I did...Great material and very well made...worth the money! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J Williamsen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. Very sturdy, good quality material. Had a cheap cover for my old bike, which was thin,would constantly be blown off by the wind and was in tatters within a couple months. I immediately noticed the difference with this cover- the material is really good quality... it's been through a few rain storms already and the bike remains dry. The cover has a strap to secure it to the bike but I haven't used it yet because the elastic bottoms have been more than sufficient to keep the cover from coming off. Could have gotten away with a Medium but I purchased a Large for my 2017 Indian Scout.
customer_reviews.author: DJR.

customer_reviews.title: Great Premium Cover
customer_reviews.text: A little early to comment on longevity. But it's a great cover. I bought the medium for a Ducati Monster S2R1000, The fit is pretty spot on. Big enough to drop on but still snug enough in the corners. I've watched it take a good lashing from some PA storms over the last couple of weeks and it hasn't flinched. Seams and stitching are well done and held up flawlessly. Hindsight being 20/20, I'd purchase the cover again.
customer_reviews.author: Aus

customer_reviews.title: Looked around at all kinds of different covers cheaper and more expensive than this item and this cover was a happy medium in price and reviews
customer_reviews.text: This was my first motorcycle cover I ever purchased my bike is 2006 Dyna Superglide FXDI 1450 as i always stored in shed..Looked around at all kinds of different covers cheaper and more expensive than this item and this cover was a happy medium in price and reviews. I’m happy with my purchase? Thru few snowstorms and rain, cover held great. Might be little Big for bike, but buckled under and is easy to maneuver. I would recommend this cover to everyone 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cover
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the details and the quality of materials. Seems very well made. strap and buckle underneath, along with robust elastic, make me think it will stay secure in winter weather. Glad I sprang for the $80 cover instead of the ~$30 options. I feel like I'll get a few good winters out of this. The Medium fits well on my V-Strom 650 with two small Givi side cases. The cover goes only slighyly below whell midline, but that's probably good... it won't be sitting in puddles or snow. Also good fast service, packaging, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can stop reading reviews, get this one
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I had bought and returned another cover that was only slightly less expensive because it was super thin & cheaply made. I wanted something that would compare to my King Kong grill cover. Durable, heavy material...something that would last. This cover fits the bill. It is definitely sturdy, it fits perfectly & it looks great. I’m sure this will fit any sport bike or cafe. The elastic around the bottom keeps it off the ground. Highley recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Octagetti

customer_reviews.title: 2008Harley Davidson Dyna Low Rider Large size fits great. Don’t think just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Stop searching and just get this cover. I looked and looked for a cover. I live in an apartment so I have nowhere to keep my bike here except outside next to my back door. I store it in the winter months so this is a outside summer cover for me. Now that I purchased is it’s name says it all. It’s called badass for a reason. Fits my 2008 Harley Davidson Low Rider from front to back reaches the ground all the way around. Thick durable and easy to put on. Now it’ll fade in the sun, but it keeps the weather out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Yup, i feel it was worth the money. Granted i have not had hurricane like storms yet but i imagine any good cover would not protect fully against that when rain is coming from all corners. However, for the rain and even bits of snow that came my way, my r3 was 100 protected. I think i saw one rain drop spot on my seat the first rain. Nothin after that. It does have holes under the reflective straps but i read that's necessary to prevent the water from rusting your bike up so im ok with it. Durability is a test of time. So can't comment on that. Had it for weeks and it's still good so far
customer_reviews.author: Zach Manning

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough to use while towing the bike
customer_reviews.text: Weatherproof, yes. Vents to prevent moisture retention, yes. Durable? Not for use while driving. I used some elastic 550 cord to wrap the cover tightly around my motorcycle to prevent it from loosely flapping while driving. Even with that several holes appeared after the 3600 mile round trip. The soft fabric that's supposed to prevent the bike from scratches basically disintegrated and left a giant mess of fibers to clean up on the bike. If you were to use this on a parked bike it would probably be great. My little CSC Motorcycle isn't rainproof so I had to cover it during my trip.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man521

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This fits our 2016 Harley Davidson Street Glide. Purchased in the large, it safely secure our bike from the elements. The heat shield on the back is useful though we still allow the bike to cool down before we cover it. There is some sun fading, but that’s to be expected since it’s not under cover in our townhouse. Over all, great purchase should get several years out of this cover
customer_reviews.author: charmed926

customer_reviews.title: BadAss Motorcycle Cover
customer_reviews.text: I like this bike cover because it looks good on my Road Glide. The fit is perfect. It protects my Road Glide. I can't say good or bad about discoloration because I don't leave my bike outside when not camping. In other words, the bike is garage kept. But when I camp overnight the cover goes on. The next day I'm riding. The bag it came with is handy. Pay attention when preparing to store your cover in the original bag. It will fit without struggle if you are paying attention to your folds and compactness. Otherwise toss it into a box. When you put it on your ride it will look good. Its BadAss.
customer_reviews.author: wfm2972

customer_reviews.title: 2006 road king perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: 2006 road king with bat wing. Large fit perfectly. Rained last night seemed to be waterproof. I like that everything is covered. I had bought the 20. 00 covers before and they last a season if your lucky. This seems to be heavier material. I don't know how it will hold up just wanted to say that a large fits a road king with a shield perfect. Will update at the end of the season
customer_reviews.author: MADJ

customer_reviews.title: Average Cover
customer_reviews.text: The black color faded very quickly in the direct sun after a few months (my Guardian cover never did). I'd say it does ok with keeping the bike dry, but overall it's a good cover for the price point. I use it on my 2012 Triumph Bonneville and it covers it completely, though I have bar end mirrors instead of the mickey mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: sb245

customer_reviews.title: This cover is bad ass
customer_reviews.text: 1. Pulling this cover out of the bag it appears to be a tough material. 2. Unfolding it for the first time was a tiring chore. It must have spent a long time in a hot warehouse tightly compacted into that bag. The entire cover or than the windshield area and the exhaust area were welded together. After pulling it apart for a tiring 20 min it was ready to try on. 3. All that stuck fabric and pulling seemed to not damage the cover and gave me a lot of inspection time. Very well made seems and great construction. 4. Medium cover fits my sportster great
customer_reviews.author: Quadcityjeff

customer_reviews.title: The best motorcycle cover.
customer_reviews.text: This cover was replacing my old one that tore up during Hurricane Irma. This cover is legitimately the best cover I’ve ever had. This cover has plenty of elastic around the bottom to help get a tight fit on your ride. The buckle attached helps securing the cover for those windy Florida days. I’d recommend getting one. My only con about this cover is that it does fade in the scorching Florida sun, but that’s not to deter the cover from performing its main function.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this cover a couple of months so take that in mind. My last cover(paid$60) lasted a year before fading and ripping). So far: I have a 2002 Vulcan “Mean Streak”. It fits tight but that’s better than loose. Strong winds do not blow off. Seems waterproof (only cover I’ve found that really is). Material seems very durable. Most expensive cover I ever bought (paid $85.00) so I give this cover an “A” so far, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: goodguyfrom Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Buy this badass!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't thrilled about the price. But definitely not worried about leaving my Vespa outside in the wind and rain. Quality is amazing. Sturdy. It's definitely WATERPROOF not water resistant. That was important to me and why I took the risk to spend the extra money. Also made in the states and I like to keep small biz owners working. My seat doesn't get wet like the last cover I had. Thick and I have recommended it to other friends who have motorcycles and have to park outside. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BETH

customer_reviews.title: It's true you get what youu pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one the covers that cost about $26-$35 very thin and I thought very cheap. But this Badass cover was definitely worth the money. My area went through some extreme weather patterns from 85 degrees to 20 degrees with ice and snow, from sunny days to days with 40 mile per hour winds and this cover held up with flying colors. I will be recommending this cover to all my motorcycle friends.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: This product IS NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Even though they say its waterproof IT'S NOT !!! My bike was soaking wet with cover on during a rainy night. I had to buy a bottle of Scotchgard heavy duty water shield to spray on the cover. Hopefully that will work but this product IS NOT WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Towery

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item yesterday, and will update this review as time goes on, but so far so good! I was a little confused about the sizing options. I have a 2016 KTM RC390 and I ordered the small size. It fits the bike perfectly! I would say the small size is good for any small to medium size crotch rocket. There's a bit of room to spare even on my bike. The item itself seems well made. The vent areas are indicated by reflective strips, and the silver heat-resistant areas on the inside make it easy to identify which is the back and which is the front. Installs easily by myself in seconds. Great product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built cover and the large size fits my Harley Davidson Ultra Classic. Mine has a high windshield so the front tire is about 1/3 exposed. It’s also very reasonably priced since it doesn’t say Harley Davidson on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cover that fit better than the other brand so took a chance on this one for my 2004 V-Rod. Got the large and it fit perfectly...covered wheels completely. I have a windshield and a fiberglass helmet pack on the back and no problem covering. Front is marked for easy on and strong elastic around the bottom. Great quality and nice bang for the buck. Love this cover.
customer_reviews.author: pj98rider

customer_reviews.title: Actually fits my bike!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is made of a fairly heavy material and seems like it will last a while (we'll see). My motorcycle is a tall dual-sport with windshield and topbox. Most covers are only 50" tall and/or way too long. This one actually comes in a size that fits my bike, yay! The adjustable strap underneath is a nice touch to keep it on in heavy wind, but with the weight of the material and serious elastic around the hem it will take a heck of a wind to lift this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Leihy

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really fit my scooter, but that is my fault. Material seems to be holding up well. UPDATE: Parking under my RV 5th wheel, cover did not hold up as long as I expected it to. Not even 18 months and being out of direct weather. Also, cats love to get under & leave paw prints on my seat!
customer_reviews.author: L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Mine already lost all of its black since I bought it but no holes other than a small one that my sisters dog made in it. Luckily it’s not in a spot where water will get through and mess with my bike. Overall happy with this purchase. Currently using to cover my weight set since it’s summer and I can leave my bike out
customer_reviews.author: halogiant

customer_reviews.title: Great bike cover!
customer_reviews.text: We got a LARGE for a 2011 Heritage Softtail Classic, (windshield/saddlebags) and it fit perfect, you wouldn't want to go any smaller, but if your bike is any bigger, go next size up. Great price and quality, weatherproof, and carrying case to take it with you. Awesome bike cover!
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent, still l like new, heavy duty easy to cover bike. Fits BMW RT1200 perfect w/ plenty room to go w/o looking it.
customer_reviews.author: Napkin, Calif

customer_reviews.title: Just had to fold the mirrors in and all was great. The reason I put 4 stars on this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Large for my 2014 FJR1300 that has a rear luggage top case on the back. This fit near perfectly. Just had to fold the mirrors in and all was great. The reason I put 4 stars on this is that at night, the visibility of this cover is not great. It does have the two strips (one on each side) but from the front or the back, you can't see anything. I've put reflective tape on it so people can see it from all angles. Otherwise, for the money, this is a great cover.
customer_reviews.author: J. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality ~ Thanks Badass!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this cover is awesome. Nicely fits my 2004 Suzuski Volusia intruder custom, I have saddle bags & a luggage bag. There is no condensation when I take the cover off.
customer_reviews.author: Barb K.

customer_reviews.title: Best cover I've ever seen!!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of motorcycle covers some ok and some not!! This cover is worth every penny!! I recently moved to an apartment on edge of town, a lot of wind and a lot of dust! This cover holds tight even in high winds!! I have a large cruiser with batwing fairing and large bags and engine gaurd with highway bars and it completely covers bike to where only bottom of tires are exposed!! GREAT COVER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buck Barbee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just didn’t fit this bike.
customer_reviews.text: The product quality was excellent and delivery was prompt. However it did not work on my 1999 Honda Valkyrie Tourer because the protective liner for the windshield only covered a small portion of the windshield if the front end was fully covered & vice versa. The cover is plenty long, just a matter of proportions.
customer_reviews.author: BillGinSD

customer_reviews.title: held up pretty well. Black faded a bit
customer_reviews.text: Was in use daily outside for a few months, held up pretty well. Black faded a bit, but material was still solid. Much heavier construction than the real cheap covers. Not completely waterproof, many times would uncover the bike after rain only to find it a bit wet. Maybe condensation, but probably the water wicked through the material. But it did keep the sun off and keep the bike pretty clean while it had to sit outside.
customer_reviews.author: EvilTwin

customer_reviews.title: Great rain protection.
customer_reviews.text: Apart from its color fading after only a couple months, this is the best bang for buck motorcycle cover. I primarily got this one because of its excellent water resistance reviews. I live in an apartment complex so my bike unfortunately sits out in the elements. I usually put it on right after riding and it handles it well with it's heat shielding. For reference, I got a small size one on a Kawasaki Z650 and it fits perfectly. Drawback; after only two months the top of the cover is super faded it looks like it's years old.
customer_reviews.author: Alegab12

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of gear for back of RV
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on a Yamaha TW200 behind my RV, a Winnebago View 24j, since the end of December 2018, and other than some sun fading is preforming way beyond my expectations. I've driven over 9,000 miles from Maryland to Florida, across the southern US to San Diego, I'm now in Lander WY, with it on and still holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nataro

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks "Badass!" This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like it better than similar Guardian covers. Unfortunately, I have to park my bikes outside, so I always keep them covered. I've used Guardian covers for years, and they've been pretty good, but they just don't last that long. They tend to come apart at the seams after about a year and a half. Hopefully this won't be the case with my new Badass cover.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover. Heavy duty. Durable. Easy to put on, no need to tie. Elastic band holds well even in wind if cover is applied to body of cycle well. Can be tied or belted on. I use it on a Piaggio MP3 500 Sport.
customer_reviews.author: Henri G. Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: this fit my Road King perfectly. I had to move to an outside driveway this winter, this covers the bike completely to the ground. It seems to be very durable and stitching is strong. has gromets for a chain to secure it. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Webb

customer_reviews.title: Covers entire bike!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT fit for our 2014 Street Glide! Hubs was so happy to finally get his cover ...
customer_reviews.author: Lori Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover to replace a previous name-brand cover which deteriorated from 2-years of wet weather in the Pacific Northwest. The bike and cover is now in Hawaii and looking forward to it standing up to the hot Hawaiian sun. Initial inspection of the cover went fine. Quality materials and good stitching.
customer_reviews.author: roadsterred

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent, fits great even with my ape hangers
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cover Monday 4/2/2018. The quality is excellent, fits great even with my ape hangers. I needed a quality cover due to our weather. The only thing we don't get is snow. This is the third cover I've had and looks to be the best one yet. You guys are the best and use the best materials. You are book marked on my computer and hope to do more business again soon. I have a lot of friends with bike and plan on letting them know about you. Your the best & thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Beebe

customer_reviews.title: How well the cover holds up in the long term.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a Badass moto gear cover for my '08 CVO Dyna. I gave 5 stars but can't honestly say how well the cover will perform. I live in Hawaii and the bike will be subjected to the sunlight part of day and may get wet because it is parked in an open air covered garage. The only thing that I don't like about the cover is that it is not lined with some sort of soft cloth. I will revisit this post once I have had a chance to get a feel for how the cover is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second it's a great quality product made in the USA by an American ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the XL fits a HD Ultra with room to spare. Second it's a great quality product made in the USA by an American company. Now, the cover needs a Velcro opening for the antennas. I'm going to install grommets so I don't have to remove them. Other than that, I would recommend this cover. I saved $100.00 and don't need to advertise for HD.
customer_reviews.author: A.D. Schriefer

customer_reviews.title: Get it. You will be sold on the high quality instantly
customer_reviews.text: Best cover I ever had. It’s thick like denim but waterproof and doesn’t move in 20 mph winds. This was my 3 cover through trial and error. Wish I would have bought this one first instead of wasting money on the cheap parachute material ones.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality is what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I've had plenty of motorcycle covers, classic car covers, and bicycle covers this is a very good product. You can buy something less expensive but if you want what you are covering to be taken care of with a good cover this is it. I don't know when the last time I took the time to review a product but felt compelled to do it for others.
customer_reviews.author: Tina White

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up on the highway but good otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t hold up on an exposed trailer on the highway. Would do great sitting there in a parking lot but if introduced to 70 mph winds it completely ripped apart. It does it’s job otherwise just don’t use it for a bike on the back of a trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great cover that fits perfect and has held up nicely
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for about a year. Keeps my bike dry in the rain and protected from the sun here in Florida. It's been a great cover for the price and it still looks great. No holes, just a little faded now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Looks custom made for Harley street glide 👍
customer_reviews.text: Hi , I just got it. It fit perfect for Harley street glide with full size tour package. First I bought XL size which is too big. Please don’t do that mistake. It’s too big and hanging to the ground. Also I have 12” windshield. So please buy size -L , you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Just got the cover and put it on it fits better than expected it hasn’t rained and I haven’t had it that long so I can’t say how it will hold up but seems to be very well-made
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Just got this cover and installed it on my 2006 Suzuki 650AN. This large scoot has a Givi windshield and rear top-box. The fit with the top-box is "snug". Over all I think this size (large) was the best choice. The bottom edge elastic makes it a bit more dificult to install but should help with wind/rain protection. The cover seems well made though the windshield pading could be more extensive, it requires very carefull installation ( common to other covers ). Four stars because of the windshield protection.
customer_reviews.author: RCWX

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a week but it fits my HD Road King perfectly. We just had a good rain and it’s dry underneath. I would only ask for larger grommets for my chain and grommets in the rear to tie it down but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: TRULY BADASS GEAR!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I gotta say is I’ve went through 2 motorcycle covers. Thanks to Badass Moto Gear. I’ve found myself a BADASS motorcycle cover. I mean I have a Yamaha v star 1100 big cruiser. I got saddle bags, windshield, bunch of other ad ons and highway safety bars. This cover covers it all and tucks neatly under the bike. Left the bike outside covered with this badass cover and the next day I removed th cover and my bike was as shiny as I left it prior to the rainy day. Their gear is truly BADASS.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Stays on even in windy weather
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover. I’ve used for about 3 months now. Keeps my Motorcycle dry. Stays on in wind and rain. I like the attached strap with latch. Very good cover at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Grieb

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, looks good!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak for how long this cover will last. I’ve only had it a month. I can say that I’m very impressed with the appearance and the fit. Some reviewer’s have complained about the bad ass logo. It’s pretty understated, so I don’t think it’s a big deal. Again, I can’t speak to it’s long-term durability, but so far I think it’s a really fine cover and I’m happy with my purchase! The large fits my 2012 triumph Tiger with panniers, perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: william sudmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and logo
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover but it is rarely used as he loves to go in the garage and just look at the bike. I on the other hand have better things to do than dust and clean chrome all the time so I cover it. Just pull it up to start it a few times a week if not riding. Fits great and looks "Badass" Love the logo.
customer_reviews.author: dirtydeedsreviewsyou

customer_reviews.title: Thought was stolen, almost bought another
customer_reviews.text: I forgot I put my cover inside my car, I usually store the cover under my car in parking garage while I'm riding my bike, thought it was stolen even I didn't see under my car. Found it inside my car after getting my car keys. Before finding in car, almost instantly bought another, this cover is very good quality and very roomy. 12' GSXR 1000
customer_reviews.author: Ballin

customer_reviews.title: I tied down the cover so it wouldn't flap much at speed and it held up great. The cover is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a chance to use this as I intended when ordered. I covered an antique motorcycle on a trailer while en-route to a classic bike show.I tied down the cover so it wouldn't flap much at speed and it held up great. The cover is heavy duty, the seams are solid and although it's not rated for use on a trailer when travelling, it seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Z400
customer_reviews.text: We have had 4 days of rain since receiving the cover and the bike has stayed completely dry. Lately it's been light snow and it shrugs that off no problem.
customer_reviews.author: TomZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this product? help up well in a windy dirt parking lot
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: and the fit was great. Nice quality material
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son, and after get got his new/used, bike all cleaned up, he put it on, and the fit was great. Nice quality material, and easy to put on. The only thing I wish different is, they would offer one with a felt like lining. Other then that, very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Feels durable and strong
customer_reviews.text: Reliable cover feels durable and hopefully will last a while. Like the strap it comes with to secure the bottom together and cover thickness isn’t too thin and flimsily. Over all satisfied with the price and the look/ durability of the product will definitely recommend to a friend or relative. Good job Badass Moto Gear!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty cover
customer_reviews.text: I had this cover original for when I was in Texas outside. It did a great job keeping everything clean. Water was no issue. I think I ordered the medium sized cover? It fits my triumph speed triple with no issue. If you don't wanna skimp out on a cover for your motorcycle definitely get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Axel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, durable cover. Don’t leave it outside in LA, scumbags will steal it (like mine🤬)
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover; it’s awesome. Unfortunately, some scumbag jerkoff stole it off my driveway, so I’m probably gonna have to buy another one. Damn garbage people of LA. You can’t leave even your motorcycle cover for your R3 outside because of scumbag people that just steal anything. 🤬🤬
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo Slice

customer_reviews.title: Well made with robust, quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fits my 2003 Honda Sabre VT1100 with windscreen, saddle bags and sissy bar perfectly. Looks sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: Rocksterr

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. It seems to waterproof. I’ve only had it a few weeks, but it’s rained a few times and the bike stayed dry. I like the clip on the bottom to keep it on if it gets windy. I got the medium and it fits both my ‘05 Kawasaki Vulcan en500c and my ‘05 Harley-Davidson sportster XL883C. No windshields or bags, but it looks like there’s still room if I add them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of very good quality and a much better deal than the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son and he really loves it to protect his new Sportster. Seems to be of very good quality and a much better deal than the one at the Harley dealership.
customer_reviews.author: PenguinPlace

customer_reviews.title: My G650gs loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Really fantastic cover. Great material. Fits snug around the tires with a belly band to clasp the sides together which I rarely use. Fits over my high windshield and top case with no problem. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A.T. Hellion

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this up and put it on my bike so I can’t talk about longevity, but the initial quality seems superb. The large size fits perfectly on my BMW R1200RT with large side bags. The fabric is very heavy duty and so is the elastic at the bottom. As advertised. A little pricy but worth the money. I expect to have this cover for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: roger baker

customer_reviews.title: Real nice cover
customer_reviews.text: A real nice cover. But I'm not fond of the term "badass" stitched into it. I bought it knowing about the logo so I shouldn't complain should I? OK, its a nice cover. Five stars for the cover....
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious Traveler

customer_reviews.title: BadAss fits my FatBob like it should
customer_reviews.text: Just got the cover and it fits my HD Fat Bob perfect unlike the HD covers I tried Seems to be made every well Only time will tell as to how well it holds up under the Florida Sunshine But for now it should keep the rain off Arrived promptly and packaged very nice but I don’t think I’ll ever get it back in the (carry) bag folded up like it was let’s be real
customer_reviews.author: Harold R Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: The name is true. It's badass.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, stout, waterproof. Stays put, good fit on Harley dresser. I expect this one will last at least as long as the last one, which was a genuine Harley cover, and twice the price of this one. Don't hesitate, this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Herring

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Cover
customer_reviews.text: Received the cover just in time for our trip to Wyoming, Montana, and Colorado. The fit was perfect for my 2016 Harley Davidson Road Glide with the attached tour pack. We had rain a couple of overnight stops. The vents worked great and kept condensation form getting on the bike. There were no leaks and with the clip underneath, the cover stayed in place perfectly. Thank you for the cover. I am glad I had it. Thomas Payne
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Payne

customer_reviews.title: One BadAss Cover !!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the most durable by cover that I’ve had in the years of mine by covers this might be the last one thank you BadAss ....!!
customer_reviews.author: Sporrt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my FZ09 too small for my FLHT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my FZ09 too small for my FLHT . If it holds up for 2years well worth the cash...
customer_reviews.author: cyclejock77

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cost more than most but I am protecting a brand new Harley road glide limited. Fits well, keeps the dust off at work. Keeps the gawking away.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my HD Sportster 1200, and it fits great. I have to keep my bike outside and this keeps the rain and sun off my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bike cover
customer_reviews.text: We have two motorbikes and have found these covers to be long wearing compared to other makes. We live in Bermuda where the sun is a constant and we have high winds/rain. They haven't ended up falling apart as other brands eventually did.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina E. Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cover and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cover and fits well. Purchased for my husbands Harley Fatboy low. Got the large and it’s roomy enough that if he decides to add saddlebags later, should still fit without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. GAUL

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good bike cover.
customer_reviews.text: It rained and it rolled off the cover to keep my bike from getting soaked. Looks to be good quality, nice tight elastic band at the bottom, excellent fit for my 2014 Moto Guzzi V7 Racer, cool red logo against the black cover. So far , so good. Time and more bad weather will tell the tale of how this cover will endure. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: ModLad69

customer_reviews.title: Good product, be aware mods can decrease coverage
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. I got the extra large but it still doesn’t quite cover everything because of my sissy bar and 16” + 2” riser ape hangers. Not really the company’s fault.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: This. Will. Last.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely KILLER motorcycle cover for my 2008 Concours 14. I’d love the rear of the cover to come a little further down so it covers the rear hub but everything else about this is incredible. EXACTLY what I was looking for and it’s obvious how anything cheaper is just a complete waste of money. Won’t buy from another motorcycle cover manufacturer ever again. Found the best and I’m sticking with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Crescenzo

customer_reviews.title: but it fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: The cover arrived when promised. I was concerned that a "Large" cover might not fit my '07 Heritage Softail with hard bags & windshield, but it fit like a glove. I was further pleased with the quality of the material and the fabrication of the cover. I've had Tyvek & flannel covers before, this product is far superior to those.
customer_reviews.author: RUpson

customer_reviews.title: It fits great! My previous cover disintegrated from sun exposure after ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the small cover for my Honda CL350. It fits great! My previous cover disintegrated from sun exposure after 1.5 years. This one seems way more durable than the one I had. I like the heat resistant panels for the pipes, though I still would let my bike cool down before putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: K. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and works nicely for my Bike. I got the large and it works nicely on my 2003 Road King Classic.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ruley

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle cover
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well made cover. Bought an XL, put it on my Harley Electra Glide. It is a bit big, but does cover it all the way to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What Fl heat?
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best cover i have ever owned. I live in South Fl where the heat is a beast and the covers ive had before just couldn't handle it. I could tell this was a quality cover as soon as I pulled it out of the box. U can feel the weight and thickness. The only issue i have is the wording on the front. I have kids and really dont want them reading "badass" every time they play in the yard. A little spray paint or magic marker takes care of that. Still 5 stars....
customer_reviews.author: Larry H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits perfect for my 2019 MT-07. Glad I went with a small. Quality feels very good and looks great. Most definitely will buy another if I ever had to.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Dries in seconds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a LG Badass cover for my 2018 Chieftain Darkhorse. It fit perfectly and was easy to put on. It poured night 1 of our 9 day bike trip. When I awoke the next am, all I did was shake the water off the cover. It was dry in seconds!! Rolled it up and put it on the next night. I will be recommending this cover to all my friends. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. Time will tell. The large size was plenty big for my Heritage softail. Like the reflective strips.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great M/C Cover
customer_reviews.text: My old cover needed replacement and the company that made it had my version on long-term backorder. Got this one from Bad Ass Moto and I'm glad I did! Get one!
customer_reviews.author: mom0f5

customer_reviews.title: Better than HD cover for 200 +
customer_reviews.text: The Quality of this cover is A1 ... Better than HD cover for 200 + ... Bought a Large for my 88 sporty with a sissy bar and ape hangers .. Fit Perfectly .. Get the large even for a smaller bike because it is 5" taller than the medium..
customer_reviews.author: michael stone

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a 1982 Kawasaki 750 and it appears to be the correct size. It is well made and goes on easily with elastic banding that keeps everything in place. Looks like you could use provided straps to really hold in on. Might want to do that if you are transporting ir expecting very high winds. I would say that this Badass cover is an excellent value for the m9bey and don't think there's any reason to spend more.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B

customer_reviews.title: Being waterproof and durable it is great for bikes that have to sit outside
customer_reviews.text: This is my second badass motogear motorcycle cover. For a different bike. Being waterproof and durable it is great for bikes that have to sit outside. Got the large size for my Suzuki 800cc which fits pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my cargo bike
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bullitt cargo bicycle that I keep outside. I got the medium and its a perfect fit. Very happy with the quality of this item and the protection it provides
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: We have had a Florida rain and wind and it held up great.
customer_reviews.text: To early to tell on longevity but it seems well made covers my streetglide completely. I did add some reflective tape to the rear end because I have it parked in a spot between 2cars. We have had a Florida rain and wind and it held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What a awesome bike cover! Hated to have to cover but moved and don't have shed built yet. Large Fits an 06 HD Streetglide took antenna off afraid it would bend. Prefect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best cover I've ever bought and I've bought a lot of them. Covers up the tour pack and the entire bike with ease.
customer_reviews.author: William Carroll

customer_reviews.title: It well made and I like that it has a tension bottom so it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and so far I am liking it. It well made and I like that it has a tension bottom so it fits snug around the bottom of the bike. It was easy to put on. I have a harleydavidson softail deluxe with hard bags. I got a large and it is not tight but it snuga the bike. Wish they had extra large. It covers 98 % of the bike . Note I also have a windshield. Personally I place a king fitted sheet then I use this cover. I baby my bike.... will write more as I use it
customer_reviews.author: donlan papp

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Used this for less than a month and it ripped. Was removing it and putting it up gently and carefully. it was stored in a safe place. Generally try to be as careful as possible with these things so I have no idea what caused this: I’ve never had a cover rip after two weeks though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ultimate Waterproof Motorcycle Cover - Outdoor Storage Motorcycle Covers for Harleys - Street or Sport Bike. Taped Seams, Windshield Liner, Heat Shield, Vents, Reflective, Grommets, Alarm Pockets, M
product_meta.description:
Size:Motorcycle: Medium

This is NOT just another cheap motorcycle cover. It's the real deal. Designed by real American bikers to compete with covers costing as much as twice the price (or even more), this cover uses top grade materials & workmanship. 

Our cover is easy to put on & take off & will protect your motorcycle in style and provide a great value along the way. Our models will fit your Cruiser, Bagger, Touring, Sport or Adventure Bike (or even scooter or moped)

It comes loaded with valuable features like hidden pockets with reinforced grommets for locks and alarms, and a soft lining for your windshield. 

Our Lightweight, Premium quality 300Denier Polyester fabric incorporates high tech waterproof coatings. Taped seams add superior water protection. It is double vented so it's breathable (which prevents condensation on your seat.

Your cover will stay put, even in wind. It has a Durable elastic bottom hem on the bottom and a securing strap with an easy latch buckle for extra wind protection.

Metallic heat shielding over exhaust area helps protect cover from heat so you can cover it sooner after your ride.

Keep your mind at ease! This motorcycle cover has everything you could ever need! 

 SIZE GUIDELINES:

 SMALL: Bikes & scooters up to 86 inches length & 50” tall without side bags. Best for street & sport bikes up to 800cc, dirt bikes, or small cruisers in the up to 400cc range.

 MEDIUM fits up to 9" L x 55.6” tall. For medium cruisers, small Harleys, Large Sport bikes (800cc & up), any small to medium bike with side bags, Up to 800cc adventure bikes.

 LARGE up to 97" long, 57” high. For full size Cruisers, Baggers, Large Adventure Bikes, and Sport Tourers. Big Harley Davidsons.

 X-Large fits up to 108" L, 65" Tall. For Honda Goldwings, Victory, Indian, Large Harley Tourers and other XL Tourers.

Every Cover is 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed so Order Yours Today.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF OUTDOOR STORAGE for your bike. Made with Sturdy, Premium Materials. DURABLE & ATTRACTIVE - High Performance Cover is Fairly Priced & Satisfaction in 1.

SIZES: SMALL motorcycle cover is 86" Long & 50" High. Best for Sport bikes up to 800cc or Cruisers up to 400cc - MEDIUM is 96" L x 55" Tall for Med. cruisers, sm. Harleys, 600-700cc adventure bikes , Lg 800cc+ Sportbikes - LARGE is 97" L x 57” high. For big cruisers, Adventure or Sport Tourers, big Harley Davidsons.- XLARGE is 108" L x 65" Tall. Honda Goldwing, Victory, Indian, Harley and other XL Tourers.

STURDY - Made with Premium Materials For All Weather Outdoor Storage or Indoor Use in Summer or Winter SUPERIOR WATERPROOFING & WIND SHELTER - Taped Seams, Elastic Hem, Buckle Keep Bike Dry & Cover On
PROTECT YOUR INVESTMENT - Night Reflective, Windhield Liner, Lock/Alarm Pockets, Exhaust Shields
SHELTER YOUR BIKE from Rain, Wind, Sun, Snow, Birds, Dust, Dirt, Wet Leaves & More
